channel.title: Document-link description (included 2.03)
channel.description:
This proposal is part of the [2.03 upgrade process](https://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/version-2-03-decimal-upgrade-index-of-proposals/838), please comment by replying below. **Standard** Activity and Organisation **Schema Object** iati-activity/document-link/description **Type of Change** Addition to Schema **Issue** A document link can point to a very big document and it would be useful for users to be assisted with a description or explanation of what to look for in the target document. **Proposal**
  • Add element iati-activity/document-link/description and iati-organisation/document-link/description
    • Definition A description of the document contents, or guidance on where to access the relevant information in the document.
    • Occurs 0..1
  • Add element iati-activity/document-link/description/narrative and iati-organisation/document-link/description/narrative As per standard use of narrative element.
**Standards Day** Accepted **Links**: N/A

item.title: Document-link description (included 2.03)
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
This proposal is part of the 2.03 upgrade process, please comment by replying below.

Standard
Activity and Organisation

Schema Object
iati-activity/document-link/description

Type of Change
Addition to Schema

Issue
A document link can point to a very big document and it would be useful for users to be assisted with a description or explanation of what to look for in the target document.

Proposal

  • Add element iati-activity/document-link/description and iati-organisation/document-link/description
    • Definition A description of the document contents, or guidance on where to access the relevant information in the document.
    • Occurs 0..1
  • Add element iati-activity/document-link/description/narrative and iati-organisation/document-link/description/narrative As per standard use of narrative element.

Standards Day
Accepted

Links: N/A

Read full topic
